name: Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat tomato sauce in a pan.
Mix the cooked pasta with the tomato sauce.
Top with cheese and serve.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Add chopped tomato and spices, cook until tomato softens.
Add water or broth, simmer until chicken is cooked through.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat a pan and pour in the egg mixture.
Cook until set, then fold and serve.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Stir-fry the vegetables in a pan with soy sauce until tender.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place cheese between the slices and grill until golden brown on both sides.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese on top.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic until soft.
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
Blend the mixture, then stir in cream.
Simmer for a few minutes and serve.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and butter.
Cook in a pan over low heat, stirring occasionally until cooked through.

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and yogurt.
Cook rice separately.
Layer the chicken and rice in a pot and cook until the flavors meld.

name: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender.
Mash the potatoes with butter, milk, and salt.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Fry paneer cubes in butter.
Cook tomato with spices, then blend into a sauce.
Add cream to the sauce and simmer.
Add paneer cubes and cook until tender.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all ingredients to form a batter.
Cook on a griddle until golden brown on both sides.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop all fruits into bite-sized pieces.
Toss with yogurt and serve chilled.
